CharacterData.Name: Tokino Sora
CharacterData.Description: She is an easy-going, happy, and comforting person whose personality has led many fans to call her 'Sora Mama' because of her motherly attitude. She also has a playful side to her, with an example being that she has put on a horse head while streaming a game. She is also a bit carefree as she does not mind revealing her age and weight on stream in contrast to other hololive members.

CharacterData.Name: Hoshimachi Suisei
CharacterData.Description: A cheerful shining Idol and Vtuber from Hololive 0th Generation. She is a forever 18, multitalented girl who deeply loves singing and idols, with the dream of one day holding a live concert in Tokyo Budokan. She started out as an independent Vtuber and later joined Inonaka Music, a music label under Hololive, before moving officially to Hololive main branch.

CharacterData.Name: Sakura Miko
CharacterData.Description: She has been working on religious services really hard as a miko in the computer world. With the revelation of the gods, she is now visiting Japan. While performing her errand, she has now decided to become and work hard as a virtual miko idol.

CharacterData.Name: Roboco
CharacterData.Description: A lonely, wimpy robot from a random wasteland. She is now hoping to contact and live with lots of people as a Virtual Liver.

CharacterData.Name: Yozora Mel
CharacterData.Description: A vampire girl. Even though she is a vampire, she is not into blood. She loves acerola juice quite a lot.

CharacterData.Name: Shirakami Fubuki
CharacterData.Description: A white haired kemomimi highschool student. Although she is shy and mostly calm, she likes to talk to people. She would be very happy if you pay attention to her.

CharacterData.Name: Natsuiro Matsuri
CharacterData.Description: A rookie on the Cheerleading Team. Cheerful and affectionate, her pleasant attitude means she gets along with everyone. She has a lot of friends, and loves festivals and events.

CharacterData.Name: Aki Rosenthal
CharacterData.Description: A girl who traveled from a different universe. She has hyper curiosity and manages to reach out to all sorts of things. Her trademark pigtails float due to some sort of supernatural power.

CharacterData.Name: Akai Haato
CharacterData.Description: A sassy kouhai. She is often prickly, however she manages to demand lots of attention from those with whom she has been getting along well. She loves red ribbons and heart shapes.

CharacterData.Name: Yuzuki Choco
CharacterData.Description: A health doctor from the Demonic-Realm Academy. Has a high reputation around the school. It was told that the line of male students never ends. She loves snacks quite a lot, although one time her desk was caked with food wrappers, and she was then scolded badly.

CharacterData.Name: Oozora Subaru
CharacterData.Description: The manager of an MMA club and an E-sports club. A supremely spirited, cheerful, lively girl who can talk to anyone without breaking a sweat. She’s currently practicing her pro-gamer skills.

CharacterData.Name: Nakiri Ayame
CharacterData.Description: A kimono-clad Oni girl from the Demonic-Realm Academy. As she loves to prank people, she always uses will-o’-the-wisp on them just to have fun. Many may not realize it, but she is actually the president of the student council.

CharacterData.Name: Murasaki Shion
CharacterData.Description: A random self-proclaimed child who appears around the Demonic-Realm Academy. She calls herself a highborne black magician.

CharacterData.Name: Minato Aqua
CharacterData.Description: A marine maid-styled virtual maid. She is trying her very best, yet is still sometimes awkward and clumsy.

CharacterData.Name: Ookami Mio
CharacterData.Description: A black haired kemomimi girl who appeared on our radar randomly. She often shows up around shrines. She likes gaming.

CharacterData.Name: Nekomata Okayu
CharacterData.Description: A cat raised by a old woman from the onigiri store. She streams just because there is a PC in the old woman’s room.

CharacterData.Name: Inugami Korone
CharacterData.Description: The dog from a random bakery. She likes to play games when she has free time while watchdogging.

CharacterData.Name: Usada Pekora
CharacterData.Description: A lonely rabbit-eared girl who loves carrots. She loves them so much that she always brings a few anywhere she goes.

CharacterData.Name: Uruha Rushia
CharacterData.Description: A necromancer from the Demonic-Realm Academy who is not good at communicating with people. She does not want to be alone, however, which is why she talks to the spirits and the damned.

CharacterData.Name: Shiranui Flare
CharacterData.Description: A half-elf who seems sloppy and undependable, however when it is time, she becomes an extremely reliable big sis.

CharacterData.Name: Shirogane Noel
CharacterData.Description: While she is easy-going, she has a dangerous side where she attempts to solve all her problems with muscle power. As much as this fluffy, meatheaded knight hungers for power, she came to the world of VTubers where all the stronk people are, for training.

CharacterData.Name: Houshou Marine
CharacterData.Description: Loves jewels, treasure, and money. Her dream is to become a pirate and go treasure hunting. In order to get a pirate ship, she is now stacking up money as a VTuber on the great lands, just like how the other land-lovers do

CharacterData.Name: Himemori Luna
CharacterData.Description: The princess of sweets. She sticks around people, and is easily impressed. However, when her childishness overloads, she will get scolded by her butler. It was also told that those moonshapes are the symbols of her country.

CharacterData.Name: Tokoyami Towa
CharacterData.Description: Towa-sama is a devil that's terrible at being a devil.

CharacterData.Name: Tsunomaki Watame
CharacterData.Description: A sheep bard that goes around everywhere. She loves singing and is fluffy! YES! FLUFFY! Being a herbivore, she loves potato chips.

CharacterData.Name: Kiryu Coco
CharacterData.Description: Coco is a lively Yakuza dragon that loves crude humor. She's a strong, openhearted, and honest person who loves making friends with other members of hololive. Additionally, Coco is the host of her own satiric news show, Asacoco.

CharacterData.Name: Amane Kanata
CharacterData.Description: An angel from the Angelic-Realm Institution. She is now studying how to heal people.To hide her shyness, she pretends to be cool.

CharacterData.Name: Yukihana Lamy
CharacterData.Description: A snow elf from a noble family renowned in the remote Land of Silver. She decided to leave her home, along with her companion Daifuku, after her heart was touched by the fun and colorful streams from hololive. Her serious personality belies her naive, sheltered nature.

CharacterData.Name: Omaru Polka
CharacterData.Description: Japanese Virtual YouTuber associated with hololive, as part of its fifth generation of VTubers. A circus performer who joined hololive in hopes of becoming the ringmaster of the VTuber world. She enjoys wowing audiences with acrobatics, and lives by the words, 'When the going gets tough, the tough get going.' If you ask her, her occasional mess ups are also part of her charm.
